import React from "react"; const PostItem = ({post}) => { return (
  • {post.username} {post.time} {post.content1}
    {post.title1st} {post.title2nd} {post.title3rd}
    {post.title4th}
    {post.content2}
    {post.link}
        {post.message}     {post.trans}     {post.love}
    • ); }; export default PostItem;
